What is the role of diacyl chlorides in the synthesis of crosslinked IRMOFs?
data.answer: They are used to synthesize the crosslinked, tetracarboxylate BDC ligands.

data.question: True or False: The PXRD patterns of all IRMOF-AMnXL samples matched the simulated IRMOF-3 powder patterns.
What is the main difference in guest entrapment observed between IRMOF-3-AM4XL and the parent IRMOF-3?
data.answer: IRMOF-3-AM4XL showed notable difference in guest entrapment due to the robust inclusion of DMF.

data.question: True or False: The solvothermal synthesis conditions for IRMOF-3-AMnXLs were the same across all variants.
What is the significance of the BET surface area measurements for IRMOF-3-AMnXL variants?
data.answer: They indicate the structural incorporation of both BDC groups into the MOF lattice and the effect of tether length on pore occlusion.

data.question: True or False: The thermal stability of IRMOF-3-AMnXL solids is on par with IRMOF-3.
